title: Crash when autograd function returns list instead of tuple
body_html:
A simple autograd function (on master). Obviously something is wrong about how I'm trying to use functions, but the error message is quite cryptic :)

UPD it doesn't like that I return the list instead of tuple, but a more gentle message would be great

import torch

class OldFunction(torch.autograd.Function):
    def forward(self, *inputs):
        return [torch.FloatTensor([1])]

class NewFunction(torch.autograd.Function):
    @staticmethod
    def forward(*inputs):
        return [torch.FloatTensor([1])]

OldFunction()()
# RuntimeError: _Map_base::at

# NewFunction.apply()
# RuntimeError: _Map_base::at
